##cargar datos

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
load("datos/accidentes2020_data.rda")
accidentes_tb <-
  accidentes2020_data |> 
  as_tibble()

accidentes_tb
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
resumen <- accidentes_tb |> count(sexo)
resumen
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}



ggplot(resumen) +
  geom_col(aes(x=sexo, y= n, fill = sexo), alpha = 0.6) +
  ggthemes::scale_color_colorblind()+
  theme_minimal()
```
